import pandas as pd

def init_dataframe(data):
    ids = [d[1] for d in data]
    fruits = [d[1]['fruit'] for d in data]
    dataframe = pd.DataFrame({'id': ids, 'fruit': fruits})
    return dataframe

import pandas as pd

def init_dataframe(data):
    ids = [d[-1] for d in data]
    fruits = [d[1]['fruit'] for d in data]
    dataframe = pd.DataFrame({'id': ids, 'fruit': fruits})
    return dataframe
